duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct the merchandising, product flow, and display to create an inspiring and dynamic experience for the customer.
Manage product flow, visual execution, and in-store marketing to drive sales and create a compelling store environment.
Mentor the team to provide a frictionless customer experience utilizing technology to transact in the moment.
Set clear objectives and coach team members on analysis of business related to visual presentation to achieve department sales goals.
Assess store business using Company reporting tools to identify merchant opportunities within product placement, outfitting, and stock levels.
Own an effective shipment process utilizing reporting and business analysis to maximize new product placement on the floor and in back of house.
Contribute to a customer-first philosophy by flexing schedule to the needs of the business and supporting operations and zone coverage as needed.
Provide global product and visual feedback to Store Manager and District Manager; submit store environment photos to highlight merchandising and display updates.
Contribute to positive team morale through brand and store initiatives such as employee recognition and team building activities.

education_certification.credential: 3+ years store visual merchandising and leadership experience
